name: www.myearthylife.com
description:
My Earthy Life stands out because our orientation lies not just with one, but two pioneering systems for WellBeing... Modern Science and Ayurveda, The Science of Longevity. 
 
These systems maybe completely different in their nature, but my earthy life unifies the best of these systems to help transform your life. Our Wellbeing Plans help transform thousands of life everyday. Design your personalised WellBeing Plan with our WellBeing Experts.

Certified Organic Herbs ,Spices , Oils etc.

jobs.title: CFO - Chief Financial Officer
jobs.description:
Highly Experienced. Commercially astute. Integrity and honesty are core to the companies values. A real team player you will inspire and nurture a teamwork and collaborative culture.

Reporting to the Founders, as My Earthy Life’s CFO, you will be a valued member of the executive team.

My Earthy Life is currently seeking a CFO to help us scale and shape the future of our business strategy. The role will lead all finance activities such as Investment raising, budgeting/forecasting, financial planning, accounting, equity and debt financing, investor relations, and acting as a partner to all business stakeholders.You love working on complex business problems and thrive in a dynamic, fast-paced and feedback-driven environment. You're highly self-motivated, have a stellar work ethic and you're looking for the right company to support your growth. If this sounds like a good opportunity, we’d love to meet you.

You're highly self-motivated, have a stellar work ethic and you're looking for the right company to support your growth. If this sounds like a good opportunity, we’d love to meet you.

jobs.title: Chief Executive Officer - CEO
jobs.description:
Bring your relevant Investment raising, and expert experience to become a member of the senior leadership team.
Support the Founders in raising investment, setting strategy, day-to-day decision support and setting and achieving
company goals.
Help to lead the planning and execution of debt and equity financing rounds, including dealing with investment
banks and potential investors
Be commercially driven. A deal maker. A rare mix we know. Handsome equity stake available for the right person.
Partner with the Founders, Board, and Executive team, as a financial problem solver and identify how operating
performance can be maximized while communicating consistently about performance and investment decisions.
Provide partnership to each business lead in developing and executing plans to grow revenue and profit in each
functional area of My Earthy Life.
Proven strategic thinker and problem solver when it comes to competitive strategy, business models and resource
allocation
A “player-coach” who can both manage teams and get into the weeds when necessary
Understand and deal with complex accounting issues, including those unique to a manufacturing, distribution and
ecommerce business.
Strong analytical skills and a data driven mindset
Track record of building and developing strong teams
Thrives in a fast-paced, entrepreneurial environment
Sense of urgency: nothing in the universe will get in the way of delivering your goals
Excellent communication and people skills - numbers are key, but a business is built with people. Relationship
building and adept communication are assets in our fast-moving environment

jobs.title: Director of Sales
jobs.description:
Entrepreneurial and commercially rewarding opportunity to be part of an organization committed to pioneering in the manufacture, design, development and distribution of WellBeing products and services.

An early stage health startup with a mission to provide cost effective and on demand health empowerment services to billions of people globally. We are currently looking for an experienced Sales /Commercial Director to join our growing team.
